title: Intro
solvedMessage: You've got it. It wasn't that hard to solve i guess. So let's start with the real riddles now.

title: Little Carly
shortDescription: Help litte Carly to solve his task.
solvedMessage: The full name of little Carly is Carl Friedrich Gauss, a mathematician from the 19th century. At the age of nine he solved the task with a simple multiplication.

title: Dwarfs and dragons
shortDescription: Help the dwarfs to save their lives.
solvedMessage: The dwarfs are save now and they lived happily ever after.

title: Altitude Differences
shortDescription: Know where your blisters come from.

title: Bad Money
shortDescription: All that glitters is not gold.
solvedMessage: You found the bag that is to light.
